title: Colours of Usernames in Boards
body:
So:

Red - Riot Member that helps out around the company as a whole. E.G: Marauder

Blue - Riot Member that helps out Players with gameplay / Helping out players with gaming. E.G: Princess Laya (Soz)

Green - Emersaries. IDK. I'M SORRY. IDK ANY PEOPLE THAT DO THIS

So are there like anymore? Or that it? Apart from us of course:

Grey / No Highlighting Colour - Player of LoL

Nooo, we're not Rioters. We're volunteers who help in the Help & Support sub-boards, answering whatever questions we can there. Maybe sometime in the future, but at the moment, just volunteers ;)
LoL being @ PAX would b pretty neat :)

Hey guys just to clear things up.

Red = Rioter

Blue/green/orange = Our boards volunteers

Boards volunteers are players not Rioters. But they have always been helpful and informative on the boards =)

You can read more about each here;
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/RaWrI4Hi-introducing-the-instructors

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/Edu7E6Bp-introducing-the-emissaries

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen

Still waiting to be nominated to be an Instructor :(

Also, will Riot be at PAX Australia?

Remember to continue being a positive force on the boards, and informative =) and one day you will be. But the key thing is the people we find for the volunteer program would do what they do regardless of if they have the title or not.

As for PAX I'm not sure, but we haven't been in awhile so it would be unlikely imo.

I know, Ima keep doing my Helping Others Improve regardless, but blue looks nice on the boards XD.

And I kinda wished you guys were at PAX, as its on Nov 4th a day after my birthday.
Ahh I see, well if anything changes I'll let you know!
Ok, ty best buddy O'l pal.
How do you become a volunteer? I would like to be one as I'm regularly checking on league and helping people out the best I can :P

TLDR-
Don't be an asshole (that's an obvious one)
Always help, regardless of titles/needs/situations
Keep doing it, even if you get it or not.

-

When I said that to Maraudaur it was a joke, its been a running joke between us for a while.
As I still think I was the Original Instructor with my league series XD
But the others do great jobs so I'm not fussed.

Green I think are volunteers who help people with common technical problems that don't really need a rioter to fix like patching, work arounds for bugs, key bindings and settings to get league to work on toasters.
